plot: A cocky dot-commer hits rock bottom and has to patch his life together with what's at his disposal; a beach, a bus, and a burro. With the help of some surfers he learns to enjoy the here and now... wherever that may be.
title: Baja Beach Bums
plot_es: A cocky dot-commer hits rock bottom and has to patch his life together with what's at his disposal; a beach, a bus, and a burro. With the help of some surfers he learns to enjoy the here and now... wherever that may be.
plot_en: A cocky dot-commer hits rock bottom and has to patch his life together with what's at his disposal; a beach, a bus, and a burro. With the help of some surfers he learns to enjoy the here and now... wherever that may be.
